description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.2zjfszFAX3NdZefF]{Stewards Stalwart}

Once per day, as a reaction when you’re subjected to a condition, you can delay the onset of that condition for 1 round. This ability can be used to delay only the following conditions: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Asleep}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.8rIj0ewW4bL8Uph5]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4WXJOFZ4s7TJUW6D]{Cowering}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.7PPRS6krnvaTHbxh]{Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{Staggered}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunned}. When a round of delay ends, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to extend the delay by 1 round. Time spent delaying counts against the condition’s duration, and if another effect ends the condition before the delay ends, the condition doesn’t affect you further.
